entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 1:37PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...NEAR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS TODAY AND SUNDAY FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHWEST WISCONSIN... Low relative humidity and breezy winds will lead to near critical fire weather conditions today and Sunday across northwest Wisconsin. Southwest turning westerly winds of 10 to 15 mph with gusts to 25 mph are forecast for this afternoon and evening.
